annotations.normalized_text: UK Medicines & Healthcare products Regulatory Agency

text: @EMA_News The UK Medicines & Healthcare products Regulatory Agency is answerable to the UK government, which is in turn answerable to the British people. The EU Medicines Agency is answerable to the EU, which is in turn answerable to no one. That is the difference.
@EMA_News Hurry up!
